org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.diskbalancer.planner

Class NodePlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.diskbalancer.planner.NodePlan

  • public class NodePlan
extends Object
    NodePlan is a set of volumeSetPlans.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NodePlan()
      Constructs an Empty Node Plan.
      NodePlan(String datanodeName, int rpcPort)
      Constructs an empty NodePlan.
